laboratory_examinations.findings: 54% (A1) and 60% (A2) above the upper limit of normal.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normal in all four subjects when DITPA dose reached 1 mg/kg/day.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 26% (A1) and 20% (A2) below the lower limit of normal.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased to the lower normal range when on DITPA.
